name: Looped (Leo Red)
description:
USE FULL SCREEN!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys,

Mouse

Looped is a shooter game where you are stuck in a loop(Circle).There will be enemies that can shoot and you have to keep them away from the loop or it will shrink.You also have  to avoid the bullets by moving using the arrow keys or you will die after 10 hits.But you can attack them by click the mouse where you want to shoot.This game was made for ludum dare 47.
